tools.name: search
tools.description:
Search DuckDuckGo and return formatted results.

    Args:
        query: The search query string
        max_results: Maximum number of results to return (default: 10)
        ctx: MCP context for logging

tools.name: fetch_content
tools.description:
Fetch and parse content from a webpage URL.

    Args:
        url: The webpage URL to fetch content from
        ctx: MCP context for logging

search.purpose: 验证search工具可以执行基本的搜索查询并返回结果

search.purpose: 验证search工具支持中文搜索查询

response.result: No results were found for your search query. This could be due to DuckDuckGo's bot detection or the query returned no matches. Please try rephrasing your search or try again in a few minutes.

search.purpose: 验证search工具对错误类型的参数进行正确校验

response.error:
ToolException: Error executing tool search: 2 validation errors for searchArguments
query
  Input should be a valid string [type=string_type, input_value=12345, input_type=int]
    For further information visit https://errors.pydantic.dev/2.10/v/string_type
max_results
  Input should be a valid integer, unable to parse string as an integer [type=int_parsing, input_value='ten', input_type=str]
    For further information visit https://errors.pydantic.dev/2.10/v/int_parsing
